ygData.subject: Re: Role Playing
ygData.msgSnippet: The actual text says Good idea. Post full walkthroughs and mark them with a warning. Stupid thing about the Stratics page - you can t see the results without
ygData.messageBody:
The actual text says "Good idea. Post full walkthroughs and mark them with a
warning."

Stupid thing about the Stratics page - you can't see the results without
voiting. I already voted - and despite the fact I'm from Chicago (well, 10
blocks north of Chicago, but I was born in the city and let's net get too
technical) I don't want to vote twice.

I voted for that - but I haven't looked at any of the walkthroughs. I'd
rather they post them for the powergamers and lazy types so I'm not spammed
with shouts or oocs asking for help in-game. With this posted - anyone who
does yell for help on a quest is someone you REALLY know hasn't bothered to
find anything else out on their own..

Slyde of Xegony

----- Original Message -----
From: Shane Bole <shane0009@...>
To: <EverQuest@onelist.com>
Sent: Tuesday, April 27, 1999 1:03 PM
Subject: [EverQuest] Role Playing


> From: "Shane Bole" <shane0009@...>
>
> this is pretty lame... this is an RPG, but on all the polls, people want
> walkthroughs on quests? where is the fun in that? maybe a hint or 2, but
its
> no fun walking around following a guide telling you to avoid so and so
> whatever to not get killed.
> just wondering if anyone aggrees with this...
>
>
